description:
Made from lightweight fabrics that help you regulate body temperature, these durable climbing pants are built for long days on the wall.

  • Durable cotton and nylon fabric with a DWR finish to shed light precip
  • Integrated adjustable waist belt to get the fit just right
  • Gusseted crotch offers room for wide stemming or hand-foot matching
  • Harness compatible front pockets, rear pocket, and zippered thigh pocket for on-route essentials
  • Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: Black Diamond Anchor Stretch Pants - Men's
